translation.zh:
‎（1994年4月 卢旺达境内
‎开始了针对图西族的大屠杀）

‎（胡图族和图西族的暴力冲突
‎在当时达到了高峰） ‎（民族矛盾在20世纪初
‎由比利时殖民者激化）

translation.en: [announcer 1 on radio] Many believe it was not an accident but an assassination.
translation.zh: ‎很多人认为这不是意外 而是暗杀
‎少将朱韦纳尔哈比阿里马纳

translation.en: said that the RPF never abandoned their logic…
translation.zh:
‎声称卢旺达爱国阵线
‎从未放弃他们的逻辑 ‎（新希望科学学院）

translation.en: [announcer 2 on radio] The big question is,
who shot down the president's plane,
translation.zh:
‎最大的问题为
‎是谁击落了总统的飞机

translation.en: and how would this turn of events further destabilize an already fragile…
translation.zh:
‎此变故会如何
‎令已经脆弱的局势更加动荡…

translation.en: [woman 1] None of us goes to the bathroom.
[woman 1] We never thought we'd be in here this long…
translation.zh: ‎我们从没想过会困在这里这么久
‎但我们将不可避免的事情延迟了

translation.en: I am writing this so that when they find our bodies,
translation.zh:
‎我写这封信的目的是
‎当有人发现我们的尸体时

translation.en: they will know how long we were here.
translation.zh: ‎他们会知道我们在这儿待了多久

translation.en: Have I told you my name?
[man] Annick! Ma puce! [in Kinyarwanda] I have one more.
translation.zh: ‎安妮可 宝贝！我又带来了一个人 ‎（第一天）

translation.en: [in English] …when it is safe for you and for him to come out. Hmm?
translation.zh: ‎到时候你和他就能安全出来了

translation.en: marching across our farm with machetes.
translation.zh:
‎挥着大砍刀
‎大摇大摆地穿过我们的农场

translation.en: It will be okay, Mutesi. Hmm?

translation.zh:
‎-弗朗索瓦…
‎-你怎么知道我的名字？

translation.en: You told us yesterday when you came.
translation.zh: ‎你昨天来的时候告诉了我们

translation.en: Francois said he found you inside the well.
translation.zh: ‎弗朗索瓦说他在井里发现了你
‎你是胡图族的 肚子里怀了孩子

translation.en: -A boy. A Hutu boy who will-- -[nun shushing]
translation.zh: ‎是一个男孩 胡图族男孩会…

translation.en: My name is Jeanette. This is Annick.
translation.zh: ‎我叫珍妮特 这是安妮可

translation.en: I may face the same danger.
We are in my home, beneath the floor of my kitchen.
translation.zh: ‎我们在我家厨房的地板底下

translation.en: We built it ourselves. Good for storing food.
translation.zh:
‎这是我们自己建的储藏室
‎很适合储存食物

translation.en: We'll be safest here, a day or so,
translation.zh:
‎这里对于我们是最安全的
‎大概待一天吧

translation.en: -I'm… I'm just-- -Peyton. Here from the United States.
translation.zh:
‎-我就是…
‎-佩顿 你是美国来的

translation.en: [in English] It's almost dark. We can sneak there.
translation.zh:
‎-天快黑了 我们可以偷偷去
‎-不行

translation.en: No. The risk is too great.
translation.zh:
‎-天快黑了 我们可以偷偷去
‎-不行 ‎-风险太大了
‎-那怎么办？

translation.en: Then what? Where are we supposed to pee?
translation.zh:
‎-风险太大了
‎-那怎么办？ ‎我们要尿在哪儿？

translation.en: -We cannot. We need-- -What? What more can we need?
translation.zh:
‎-不能这样 我们需要…
‎-什么？我们还需要什么？

translation.en: Francois will give us everything we need.
translation.zh: ‎弗朗索瓦会提供我们需要的一切

translation.en: [in English] We are locked in here?
This room is for storing things, not intended for people to be inside.
translation.zh: ‎这是储藏室 不是让人待的

translation.en: It locks when the door closes.
Francois says it will end quickly.
[Annick] Think about something else. That's what I'm doing.
translation.zh: ‎想想别的事 我就是这么做的

translation.en: [Peyton gasps] No, no, no. No, no, no.
Uh, I… I have an idea for a toilet, for now,
translation.zh:
‎我想到了个上厕所的办法
‎只是暂时的

translation.en: but I… I need your help.
Um, I… I think there's, like, a hole right here.
Five years. But we've known each other since we were very young.
translation.zh: ‎结婚五年了 但我们是青梅竹马

translation.en: Almost our whole lives. We were in primary school when he told me
translation.zh: ‎是从小一起长大的 ‎还在上小学的时候 他就跟我说

translation.en: he had claimed me. I was his.
translation.zh: ‎我是他的人 他就将我据为己有了

translation.en: It is a good thing you've not had a child yet.
Times like these, he'd be out there chopping his friends.
translation.zh:
‎这种时势之下
‎他会在外面拿刀砍他的朋友

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Maybe he would chop you.
-[gun firing in distance] -[Annick] What about you, Peyton?
How do you be a nun
God is not of this world.
He created it, but he is not of it.
translation.zh:
‎这个世界是他创造的
‎但他不属于这里

translation.en: But all we really know is what we can see, right?
What we can physically feel, you know? And anything can change, just like that.
translation.zh: ‎亲身所感才是真实的 知道吗？ ‎一切都可能会在一瞬间改变

translation.en: The world does seem that way.
You never know what is coming next.
translation.zh: ‎你永远不知道接下来会发生什么

translation.en: And… right when you think you do, it's completely something else.
translation.zh:
‎当你以为自己深谙世道时
‎就会天翻地覆

translation.en: That is why you have no children?
I assume they'd be here, not us.
translation.zh:
‎要是有 我猜在这里的会是他们
‎而不是我们

translation.en: Children have not been in God's plan for us.
translation.zh: ‎上帝没有计划让我们有孩子

translation.en: We have not been able to.
[boy 1] Christophe is going to stomp you so bad later.
translation.zh: ‎克里斯托弗一会儿会狠狠打败你

translation.en: [boy 2 in English] Because Christophe was a cockroach.
[man in Kinyarwanda] Hey! What are you doing?
-[boy 3 in English] We are Hutu, I swear. -[man] Shut up!
translation.zh:
‎-我们是胡图人 我发誓
‎-闭嘴！

translation.en: This is not the time for games.
translation.zh: ‎现在不是闹着玩游戏的时候

translation.en: -You proud to be Hutu, boys? -[boy 2] Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-小子们 为自己身为胡图人自豪吗？
‎-是的

translation.en: [man] This place, this land, is your birthright.
translation.zh:
‎这个地方 这片土地
‎就是你们与生俱来的权利

translation.en: And you, you are old enough.
You should have your identity card everywhere you go!
Don't you want it known you are the better race?
translation.zh:
‎你不想让人知道
‎你属于更高级的种族吗？

translation.en: This is the time for cleansing!
The penalty today is one ball.
[man in English] Hey, hey! What are you doing over there?
and then the right hand meets once in the middle,
translation.zh: ‎然后拿出右手在中间互拍一次

translation.en: [whispering] I'm serious. This is not a time for games.
translation.zh:
‎我没有开玩笑
‎现在不是玩游戏的时候

translation.en: What else are we supposed to do?

translation.zh: ‎盘子里有泡泡糖 泡泡糖

translation.en: How many pieces do you wish?
-[Peyton] Annick, you're not it. -[gun firing in distance]
-Oh, oh, oh. -[Peyton] Take your foot out.
So, what happens when you're it?
Well, whoever's it has to chase…
translation.zh: ‎如果你被选中了 就要追…

translation.en: Five, six, seven, eight, try to keep your thumbs straight.
translation.zh: ‎五、六、七、八 努力伸直大拇指

translation.en: No, no, no, no. It's unsafe.
-We cannot leave her. -[Annick] Not with our voices.
translation.zh:
‎-我们不能丢下她不管
‎-我们不能用嗓子喊

translation.en: We could throw something out there, get her attention.
translation.zh: ‎可以扔点东西出去 引起她的注意

translation.en: [man 1 in Kinyarwanda] I don't care if it tastes like piss,
as long as it gets me drunk.
You cannot trust him, no matter how well you know him.
translation.zh: ‎不管你跟他有多熟 都不能相信他

translation.en: [Pascal in Kinyarwanda] Look here, a cockroach!
[Pascal in Kinyarwanda] Bring her along quick.
[Hutu soldier in English] This will end easy and painless for you if you tell us now.
translation.zh:
‎如果你现在告诉我们
‎这事就能轻易解决 毫无痛苦

translation.en: Ah, you think we won't find them? We found you.
translation.zh:
‎你以为我们找不到他们吗？
‎我们找到你了

translation.en: It is my job to hunt them down.
-If you won't tell us, well… -[woman] We all scattered so fast.
translation.zh:
‎-如果你不告诉我们 那么…
‎-我们很快就分散开了

translation.en: [Pascal] You do not want to feel this in your flesh.
translation.zh: ‎你不会想亲身感受这把刀有多锋利的

translation.en: You don't want your husband or your children to feel it either.
translation.zh:
‎你也不会想
‎让你的丈夫或孩子感受到

translation.en: If you tell us where they are, they won't have to.
translation.zh:
‎如果你告诉我们他们在哪里
‎他们就可以免受痛苦

translation.en: I will feed them each a bullet instead.
translation.zh: ‎我会给他们每人喂一颗子弹

translation.en: -You can stop this, please. -[Pascal] Oh, shut up!
translation.zh:
‎-你可以阻止这一切 求求你
‎-闭嘴！

translation.en: You know, you really are a bitch!
And those ugly children, like an ugly dog. Look at me!
translation.zh:
‎还有那些丑陋的孩子
‎和其貌不扬的狗一样 看着我！

translation.en: [in English] I say she's more like a fat fucking cow ready to push out another one, eh?
translation.zh:
‎我觉得她更像是一头破肥牛
‎随时准备着再生一个崽子

translation.en: [Pascal] Where are you going, huh? Where are you going? Huh?
-Take her over there! -Oh God, no! No!
[Pascal in Kinyarwanda] It's your turn, brother.
You will rot in hell for this!
translation.zh: ‎干这种事会让你烂在地狱里！

translation.en: -You will rot in hell-- -[Hutu soldier yelling]
She and her husband ran the main bakery.
translation.zh: ‎主面包店是她和她丈夫开的

translation.en: And the two who killed her… [sniffling]
Pascal, he used to sing in the choir.
He had the most beautiful voice.
-No, we are alive because of her. -[sobbing] She was… She was…
translation.zh:
‎-不 我们是因为她才活着
‎-她… ‎她…

translation.en: Why didn't you say she was pregnant?
That would have made the difference? Only women who bear children matter?
translation.zh:
‎那样就不一样了？
‎只有生孩子的女人才重要吗？

translation.en: -The rest are not worth your mercy? -[Jeanette] She has been merciful.
translation.zh:
‎-其他人不值得你怜悯？
‎-她很仁慈

translation.en: -[Annick] There was nothing-- -Do not touch me!
They would never kill a precious American.
translation.zh: ‎他们绝不会杀害矜贵的美国人

translation.en: Akimana should have been in this room.
No, no. Shh. This is not God's truth.
-I know it is hard. -Are you mad or stupid?
translation.zh:
‎-我知道这很难
‎-你是疯了还是笨？

translation.en: We must have faith and pray.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须心怀信仰 诚心祷告

translation.en: The Lord Jesus is always listening.
People are being slaughtered like sows in the street, and for what?
translation.zh:
‎人们在街上像母猪一样被宰杀
‎是为什么呢？

translation.en: He may not always give us the answer--
translation.zh: ‎他可能不会总是给我们答案…
‎像母猪一样 在街上被宰杀！

translation.en: People who have killed will have to answer for their transgressions
should ever have to suffer that.
I know what that is like.
He would hurt my mother that way sometimes.
He would force himself on her.

translation.zh: ‎白人过来 说要弄身份证

translation.en: Said, "Hutu get this," said, "Tutsi get that."
translation.zh:
‎说：“这是给胡图族的”
‎说：“那是给图西族的”

translation.en: and tell me that those boys do not deserve to suffer in hell.
translation.zh: ‎告诉我那两个男孩不需要被打下地狱

translation.en: Because you'd have to judge your father for being a pig?
translation.zh:
‎因为你不得不评判你的父亲
‎说他是猪吗？

translation.en: And perhaps Akimana should have been in here,
Akimana is with the Lord now.
translation.zh: ‎阿吉玛娜现在在神的身边了

translation.en: we pray for the soul of Akimana Murenzi.
translation.zh: ‎我们为阿吉玛娜木伦兹的灵魂祷告

translation.en: They knew she had children missing.
-[gun firing in distance] -Why would you hide us?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么愿意把我们藏起来？

translation.en: When the violence broke out, the militia was pillaging homes.
translation.zh: ‎暴力冲突爆发的时候 ‎民兵分子开始掠夺家园

translation.en: Francois says they have lists of names.
translation.zh: ‎弗朗索瓦说他们有一份名单

translation.en: Names of Tutsi and of Hutu moderates.
translation.zh: ‎图西族和胡图族温和派的名字

translation.en: Francois is a teacher at a school for the education of both Tutsi and Hutu.
translation.zh:
‎弗朗索瓦是老师
‎既教图西族 也教胡图族

translation.en: We never believed Tutsi were better than us,
translation.zh: ‎我们从来不觉得图西族高我们一等

translation.en: no matter what prejudice you've seen
or what you were told as children.
translation.zh:
‎或者我们从小被灌输的
‎是什么样的理念

translation.en: No person is better than any other.
And we must love ourselves to be able to love each other.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须爱自己 才能彼此相爱

translation.en: You were a lonely little girl.
You only listen to judge and not hear.
translation.zh:
‎你听风就是雨 妄下评论
‎别人的话你都听不进去

translation.en: You are right. I… I was a lonely little girl.
translation.zh:
‎你说得对
‎我的确曾是个孤独的小姑娘

translation.en: [in Kinyarwanda] What are you doing? What is this?
[in English] You hide food from us, and you have it all for yourself.
translation.zh:
‎你私藏食物 不让我们知道
‎只顾着给自己吃

translation.en: Stop! She came to feed the poor Africans.
translation.zh: ‎住手！ ‎她来给非洲穷人提供食物的

translation.en: [Annick] Mutesi, this is not for you to-- Stop this!
translation.zh: ‎穆特西 这不是给你…住手！

translation.en: -This is not-- -She was letting us starve!
[Peyton] No, I was saving it, in case…
translation.zh: ‎不 我是想留着 以防…

translation.en: What if we're in here for a while?
translation.zh: ‎要是我们要在这儿待上一段时间呢？

translation.en: I… I was going to share the food. I was.
translation.zh:
‎我本来是打算
‎将食物分享出去的 没骗你们

translation.en: I don't need your disgusting food.
there's no way to know if Francois is coming back.
translation.zh: ‎我们无从知道弗朗索瓦会不会回来

translation.en: So if… if this is all we have, then…
translation.zh: ‎所以如果我们只有这些食物 那么…

translation.en: [Jeanette] Father, bless this food. Forgive us our trespasses…
translation.zh:
‎天父 请保佑我们的食物
‎原谅我们的罪过…

translation.en: This is all I ever wanted,
Trust in God to give you the gifts you ask for.
translation.zh:
‎相信上帝
‎他会给把你想要的礼物都给你

translation.en: but I can't help asking what keeps Francois for so long.
translation.zh:
‎但我忍不住想问
‎弗朗索瓦为什么这么久还不回来

translation.en: he is thinking about you and that baby boy
translation.zh: ‎他都在想你和你肚子里的小男孩

translation.en: and doing everything he can to come back here.
God has given you a strong boy.
translation.zh: ‎上帝赐给你一个强壮的男孩

translation.en: Do you like that book, Peyton?
Would you mind reading it to us?
I'm… I'm not very good at reading out loud. Um…
But… But you can read it.
I haven't tried reading English in a very long time,
translation.zh: ‎我已经很久没有试过读英文书了

translation.en: I could not read it well. [chuckles]
Really? You… You speak it perfectly.
Most all Rwandans speak it, but we are not really taught the letters.
translation.zh:
‎大部分卢旺达人都会说这种语言
‎但我们没有学过字母

translation.en: It has nothing to do with that, not for me.
translation.zh:
‎这和种族无关
‎反正我的情况不是这样的

translation.en: My family and I have been goat farmers my whole life.
translation.zh: ‎我的家人和我一辈子都是养山羊的

translation.en: No more privileged than any Hutu.
translation.zh: ‎比胡图族人多不了多少特权

translation.en: I wanted to know the language.
"The seeds of love are planted round the world."
translation.zh: ‎“爱的种子被种在了世界各地”
‎“它们被收拢起来 播撒出去”

translation.en: "Seeds of love are planted each and every day."
"They're part of life in every single way."
translation.zh: ‎“在方方面面 它们都是生命的组成”

translation.en: I was afraid. I was afraid you were…
You must know that I will never, never leave you.
translation.zh: ‎你要知道 我永远都不会扔下你不管

translation.en: No, no, no. Stay… stay there. Stay hidden.
[Francois] It has been a bit of chaos.
But I remembered you had Peyton's food and some water already.
translation.zh:
‎但我记得
‎你们已经有了佩顿的食物和水

translation.en: I tried to come back to bring some more, but it has not been possible.
translation.zh:
‎我想带更多东西回来
‎但一直没有成功

translation.en: The UN is here to take you.
I… I am sorry, ma puce, but our time will come soon.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 宝贝 但很快就轮到我们了

translation.en: [Francois] The UN will come for the rest of us.
translation.zh: ‎联合国之后会来接剩下的人

translation.en: -I just… I don't understand-- -[Francois] Now. We must go now.
translation.zh:
‎-我就是…我不明白
‎-快 我们得马上走

translation.en: [Peyton] It shouldn't… It shouldn't be me.
-I love you, ma puce. -[Annick] I love you too.
You are a child enough. Someone should be protecting you.
translation.zh: ‎你年纪也算是小孩子了 ‎你应该被人保护

translation.en: -What if I can't keep you safe? -The UN's here.
translation.zh:
‎-如果我不能保证你的安全 怎么办？
‎-联合国来了

translation.en: -They'll come back for us tomorrow. -One more day your mother worries.
translation.zh:
‎-他们明天就会回来接我们
‎-那就要让你妈妈多担心一天

translation.en: My parents haven't worried about me in years.
translation.zh: ‎我的父母都好几年没担心过我了

translation.en: She should have left. She cuts our food rations by a fourth.
translation.zh:
‎她应该离开的
‎她要分四分之一的食物

translation.en: We would have starved already without her.
translation.zh: ‎即使没有她 我们也已经饿着肚子了

translation.en: Peyton, the love of a mother and a father is like nothing on this Earth.
translation.zh:
‎佩顿 地球上任何东西
‎都比不上父母对孩子的爱

translation.en: I like to imagine that that's real for every child, but, uh…
translation.zh:
‎我很愿意想象
‎所有孩子都能淹没在父母的爱里

translation.en: Some kids, they mess up bad enough, and there's no more chances after that.
translation.zh:
‎但有些孩子闯了太大的祸
‎导致后来再也没有机会了

translation.en: It's like love can't find them anymore.
translation.zh: ‎就像是爱已经无法找到他们了

translation.en: -Your mother's love-- -I killed my little brother.
translation.zh:
‎-你母亲的爱…
‎-我害死了我的弟弟

translation.en: My parents, they were at a work party,
So I told him that I would drive him to the video store
translation.zh:
‎于是我就跟他说
‎我会开车带他去音像店

translation.en: if he cleaned up my mess.
translation.zh: ‎条件是他要收拾我的烂摊子

translation.en: Put my beer bottles in the neighbor's trash.
translation.zh: ‎把我的啤酒瓶扔到邻居的垃圾桶里

translation.en: He did it because he didn't want me to get sent away again.
translation.zh:
‎他这么做是因为
‎他不想让我再次被送走

translation.en: I had no idea how drunk I was. [sniffling]
…everyone agrees that it… it shouldn't have been Caleb.
translation.zh: ‎所有人都认为死的不应该是凯勒

translation.en: a few times since to, um,

translation.zh: ‎解除他们的负担 不再拖累他们 但…

translation.en: That is why you are in Rwanda.
is that you trying to unburden them?
translation.zh: ‎你通过那种方式为他们解除负担？

translation.en: She was their burden, and now she is our burden, so tell us--
translation.zh:
‎她是他们的负担 ‎但现在她成了我们的负担
‎你告诉我们…

translation.en: You think because you are so smart,
because you see through people, it gives you the right to be so cruel?
translation.zh:
‎以为自己能看穿别人
‎就想当然地认为你有权利尖酸刻薄？

translation.en: …why you pick us all apart, but it's already so obvious.
translation.zh:
‎你为什么要挑我们毛病
‎但这是明知故问

translation.en: You were violated in the worst ways,
but that does not give you the right to violate everyone else.
translation.zh: ‎但那不意味着你有权利侵害别人
‎所以拜托你不要纠缠我们了

translation.en: I would if you didn't lock us in here.
translation.zh:
‎要不是你把我们锁在这里
‎我才不会纠缠你呢

translation.en: You don't actually have to cut that deep to get to the radial artery, but, uh,
translation.zh: ‎要想割到桡动脉 其实不需要割很深

translation.en: No amount of volunteer work will save your soul.
translation.zh:
‎不管你做多少义工工作
‎都拯救不了你的灵魂

translation.en: Taking one's own life is the greatest sin.
translation.zh: ‎夺走自己的性命是最大的罪过

translation.en: Only repentance before God might save you.
translation.zh: ‎只有在神面前悔改才能拯救你

translation.en: You told me once that you became a nun because your father was a priest.
translation.zh:
‎你曾经告诉我说
‎你成为修女是因为父亲是神父

translation.en: Imagine being forgotten because of what you've suffered.
translation.zh: ‎想象一下你因为受过的苦而被遗忘

translation.en: Because no one knows what to say.
They look through you as if you're not there.
translation.zh:
‎他们对你视而不见
‎好像你并不存在一样

translation.en: Four babies have lived and died inside me.
translation.zh: ‎有四个胎儿死在了我的肚子里

translation.en: Does that give me the right to be cruel like you?
translation.zh: ‎那我有权利像你一样残忍吗？

translation.en: When Francois returns, you have my blessings to leave.
translation.zh: ‎等弗朗索瓦回来后 我会允许你离开

translation.en: [in English] Allow me to piss in peace.
Too much of the fucking beers.
-Bouffons, who is next on our list? -[zipping]
translation.zh: ‎蠢货们 名单上下一个是谁？

translation.en: I was thinking I may give it a try.
I said before, I haven't tried in many years.
translation.zh: ‎我说过 我已经很多年没读过了

translation.en: It's never too late to learn
We have nothing else to do but have men piss on us.
translation.zh:
‎除了让男人们往我们身上撒尿
‎我们也没什么事情可干了
‎很好 没错 就是“科恩”

translation.en: [Francois] I'm sorry I was so long to return.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我隔了这么久才回来

translation.en: There's been no safe time with the damned rain.
translation.zh: ‎外面下着大雨 没有安全的时机 ‎（第15天）

translation.en: The Hutu army has been patrolling.
You wanted to leave here? Now is your chance.
translation.zh: ‎你想离开这里？你的机会来了

translation.en: Here's the rest. Here, take it.
Do not speak. Do not move.
-Stay with us. -[Francois] No, they will find us all.
translation.zh:
‎-留下来跟我们待着
‎-不 他们把我们都找到的

translation.en: Stop this right now. Release me.
[Francois] Yes, yes. Uh, give me a moment, please.
[Commander] We have your name, Francois. You see?
translation.zh:
‎我们有你的名字 弗朗索瓦
‎你看到了吗？

translation.en: This… This must be a mistake, sir.
translation.zh: ‎你们一定是弄错了 长官

translation.en: [Commander] Would you call your neighbors liars?
[man in Kinyarwanda] They are faithful to our cause.
They have informed us you are not.
[Commander in English] Is anyone else here in your home with you?
You two stay here, watch for cockroaches.
translation.zh: ‎你们两个留在这里 看看有没有蟑螂

translation.en: [Commander] This is your wife in this picture?
translation.zh:
‎-这张照片里的是你老婆？
‎-是的

translation.en: [Francois] Yes. She's Hutu. On a trip with her mother in Gitarama.
translation.zh: ‎她是胡图族的 ‎跟她妈妈去吉塔拉玛省旅行了
‎没有 长官 是的 长官

translation.en: This plaque recognizes the accreditation for my school.
translation.zh: ‎这块铭牌是我学校的资格认证

translation.en: [Francois in Kinyarwanda] Oh, no. I educate Hutu children.
-[Commander] A strong Hutu man, eh? -[Francois chuckles] Ye… yes, sir.
translation.zh: ‎一个强壮的胡图男人 对吗？ ‎是的 先生

translation.en: [Commander] Brought up in a world without Tutsis.
translation.zh: ‎在一个没有图西族的世界里长大
‎来吧 兄弟们！ ‎来吧 兄弟们

translation.en: Let's leave him to paint the boy's nursery.
translation.zh:
‎我们走吧
‎让他给男孩的婴儿房上油漆

translation.en: You can join up with us when you're done.
[man in English] Nothing more gratifying than killing cockroaches.
translation.zh: ‎没有比杀蟑螂更令人满足的了

translation.en: [Commander] We will be back to visit again, Francois.
translation.zh: ‎我们会再来看你的 弗朗索瓦

translation.en: I look forward to meeting your wife.
Wait, we must set rations! No, stop! We are all starving!
translation.zh:
‎等等 我们必须设定配给量！
‎停下来！我们都饿着肚子！

translation.en: What is wrong with you? You are like those dogs.
translation.zh: ‎你怎么回事？你和那些狗一样

translation.en: I will kill you for that rice.
translation.zh: ‎为了抢到米 我会出手杀了你

translation.en: It sickens me to look at you! It sickens me!
translation.zh: ‎看着你真是恶心！让我恶心死了！

translation.en: We are going to die in here.
Over two weeks and nothing from Belgium.
translation.zh:
‎已经过了两周多了
‎比利时没有做任何行动

translation.en: [inhales] Who is going to end this?
My father said she died in sin.
I am afraid to ask God
Have I been faultless enough to absolve her?
translation.zh: ‎我够不够完美 足以为她解罪？

translation.en: -What is that little thing up there? -[dog barking outside]
translation.zh: ‎（第25天） ‎那上面的小东西是什么？

translation.en: Uh, that's an apostrophe. They put it there when a letter is missing.
translation.zh: ‎那是撇号 可以取代消失的字母

translation.en: Why don't they just put in the letter?
Mmm, because, well, it makes you pronounce it differently.
[in English] Why do you want to speak so fast?
That's… That's a contraction. It comes from "do not."
translation.zh:
‎那就是一个省略用法
‎原本应该说“怎么不”

translation.en: [Annick] No, no, no. Don't tell me.
Any time you want to play, let us know.
translation.zh: ‎你想玩的时候 就随时告诉我们

translation.en: You'll read them to him someday.
translation.zh: ‎你以后会有机会亲口念给他听

translation.en: [Annick] I'm only on my second one so far.
we marked the wall for day 34."
translation.zh: ‎我们在墙上做了被困第34天的标记”

translation.en: "It feels like a lifetime in this room."
translation.zh:
‎“在这间小屋里
‎有种度日如年的感觉”

translation.en: "Can't remember the feel of a bath on my skin."
translation.zh:
‎“想不起来洗澡的时候
‎皮肤是什么感觉”

translation.en: "But I learn things I have never known."
translation.zh: ‎“但我学到了我从来不知道的东西”

translation.en: I have thought must have a perfect life,
translation.zh: ‎我以为她一定过着完美无瑕的生活

translation.en: carrying a burden she hasn't relinquished into God's hands."
translation.zh:
‎却背负着重担
‎未曾将担子交到上帝的手中”

translation.en: but a victim who claims her anger like her name."
translation.zh:
‎但她却是个受害者
‎戾气很重 脾气暴躁”

translation.en: you will be my great happiness."
so you will know the truths we cannot always see in the open."
translation.zh:
‎是为了让你知道
‎我们不一定能公开知道的真相”

translation.en: I don't want to die with this anger.
translation.zh: ‎我不想带着这份愤怒进入坟墓

translation.en: My family and I, our farm is quite small,
translation.zh: ‎我的家人和我的农场挺小的

translation.en: but I've always wanted to make things change.
The women in my village, they would do nothing.
translation.zh: ‎村子里的女人们只会无动于衷

translation.en: These women, like mothers to me,
translation.zh: ‎这些女人就像我的妈妈一样

translation.en: It burned me up like fire.
I was with my mother when the killing started.
translation.zh: ‎大屠杀开始时 我和母亲在一起

translation.en: There was a moment I could have protected her,
translation.zh: ‎有那么一瞬间 我是可以保护她的

translation.en: If I do nothing for you now, then I am no different
translation.zh:
‎要是现在我对你们也是无动于衷 ‎那我和村子里
‎那些无动于衷的女人们是一样的

translation.en: than those women who did nothing for me.
translation.zh:
‎那我和村子里
‎那些无动于衷的女人们是一样的
‎也许我们应该给他取个名字

translation.en: [Jeanette] "Seeds of people come from moms and dads together
to make a baby boy or girl
and gives us future moms and dads."
Seeds of goats and all the animals

translation.zh: ‎都是按照同一种方式种下的

translation.en: -[Jeanette] No, give it to me. -[Peyton] Jeanette.
-[banging on floor] -[Annick] You're going to break it.
-[Jeanette panting] Let me try! -[Peyton] Jeanette, stop!
[Jeanette] The Lord will let us have our light back!
translation.zh: ‎上主会让我们重新拥有光明的！

translation.en: -[Mutesi] You're going to break it. -[Annick] Show mercy to my family.
translation.zh:
‎-你会弄坏它的
‎-请怜悯我的家人

translation.en: They will not be found at New Hope.
translation.zh: ‎他们待在新希望学院 就不会被发现

translation.en: He cannot stay at New Hope.
They are killing every Tutsi and every Hutu moderate.
translation.zh:
‎他们要把所有图西族人
‎和所有温和派胡图族人杀光
‎他应该找一个别的地方躲起来

translation.en: I am so sorry I failed you.
You are the greatest teacher in Kigali.
Ma puce, that was a long time ago.
translation.zh: ‎宝贝 那是很久以前的事了

translation.en: [sniffling] We got new books years ago.
Have you been eating? You don't look well.
translation.zh: ‎你吃东西了吗？ ‎你看起来不太好

translation.en: [Annick] He kicks. He's… He's resting more.
translation.zh: ‎他会踢我 但也休息得更多了

translation.en: -Take it. -[Francois] No. It is for you and him.
Thank you, ma puce. Thank you.
The killings have only gotten worse each day.
They say hundreds of thousands, ma puce.
translation.zh: ‎他们说已经杀了几十万人了 宝贝

translation.en: And no one has come to make it stop.
They say Hôtel des Mille Collines is the only safe place of refuge,
translation.zh:
‎他们说米勒科林斯酒店
‎是唯一安全的避难所

translation.en: but the roadblocks… There's no way to get there.
translation.zh: ‎但有路障 根本没办法去到那儿

translation.en: Ma puce, I do not know when I will be back.
translation.zh: ‎宝贝 我不知道我什么时候会回来

translation.en: If they find us, I don't know what to…
translation.zh: ‎要是他们找到我们 我不知道该怎么…

‎-我爱你 宝贝
‎-不 留下来

translation.en: -You can only be safe if you stay. -[Francois] I cannot.
translation.zh:
‎-你只有待在这里才能安全
‎-我不能

translation.en: There are others who need help too.
I found them hiding. No food, no water.
translation.zh:
‎我发现她们藏起来了
‎没有食物 没有水

translation.en: -Then I'll come with you. -[Francois] No, please.
translation.zh:
‎-那我跟你一起去
‎-不要 求你了

translation.en: Please. Please, you will stay here.
You cannot leave me to rot while you help them.
translation.zh:
‎你不能自己去帮助他们
‎然后让我腐烂在这儿

translation.en: How can you do that to me? Hmm?
You cannot help them while we starve!
translation.zh:
‎你不能让我们饿着肚子
‎然后去帮她们！

translation.en: -[Francois] Annick, they are dying. -Our boy is dying!
translation.zh: ‎安妮可 她们快死了 ‎我们的儿子也快死了！

translation.en: -[sobbing] -Listen to me. Listen to me. Listen to me.
Oh my God. No, she's in labor.
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊 不好 她要生了

translation.en: I've done this many times with the goats. Slow her heartbeat so she will bleed less.
translation.zh:
‎我给山羊接生过很多次 ‎让她的心跳慢下来
‎她流的血就会少一点

translation.en: Annick. Annick, you must stop this noise.
translation.zh: ‎安妮可 你不能大喊大叫

translation.en: You breathe with us now, yes?
translation.zh: ‎跟我们一起呼吸 可以吗？

translation.en: That is very good, Annick. You're doing much better than the goats.
translation.zh:
‎太好了 安妮可
‎你做得比山羊好多了

translation.en: "None of us goes to the bathroom."
"I can feel my spirit eager for the long sleep."
translation.zh:
‎“我能感觉到
‎我的灵魂渴望睡一场长长的觉”

translation.en: "We never thought we'd be in here this long,
translation.zh: ‎“我们从没想过会困在这里这么久
‎但我们将不可避免的事情延迟了”

translation.en: "Are you with God, my sweet angel?"
translation.zh:
‎“你是和上帝在一起了吗
‎我亲爱的小天使？”

‎“弗朗索瓦
‎你怎么这么久还不回来？”
‎“当我看向外面 看到了男人

translation.en: piled up in that mocking grave,
translation.zh: ‎在那嘲笑世事的坟墓里越堆越高

translation.en: I wish to be one of them."
"Only so that I might rest beneath the sky
translation.zh: ‎“只有这样 我才能在苍穹之下长眠

translation.en: with the cool rain to cleanse my skin."
translation.zh: ‎让冰冷的雨水清洗我的皮肤

translation.en: "Only so that the mud would rise up and cradle me."
translation.zh:
‎“只有这样 泥土才会升起来
‎将我拥入怀里“

translation.en: It is your turn to read.
Please wake. Please wake. Please wake.
It is okay. It is me. It is me.

translation.zh: ‎我是升天了 见到天使了吗？

translation.en: I see angels when I close my eyes.
They are going to take him soon.

translation.zh:
‎-也带走我
‎-不 你别睡过去

translation.en: We have a duty to fight.
Ma puce, listen carefully to me.
I held her when she was born.
translation.zh: ‎她刚出生时 我还抱过她

translation.en: This is why we must fight. Huh?
translation.zh: ‎正因如此 我们才得抗争

translation.en: Ma puce, the rebel army is fighting back, and they are winning.
translation.zh: ‎宝贝 反抗军正在反击 占了上风

translation.en: The Hutus have begun to flee.
We can make it to the Hôtel des Mille Collines
if we go in the night. Huh?
You only need to survive here one day more.
translation.zh: ‎你们在这儿再多活一天就行了

translation.en: when bees make honey, mmm, so sweet."
translation.zh: ‎因为蜜蜂将蜂蜜变得甜蜜蜜”
‎都是按照同一种方式种下的

translation.en: creating baby goats and other creatures,
translation.zh: ‎创造出山羊宝宝和其他小动物

translation.en: -[vehicle doors open, close] -[man outside] Out! All of you!
[in Kinyarwanda] Go inside and bring Francois out here.
[Peter in Kinyarwanda] Seba… Sir, my students…
[Seba in English] Peter, do what is right.
[in Kinyarwanda] Do it, Peter! Or your cockroach students will all die.
translation.zh: ‎动手吧 皮特！ ‎不然你的蟑螂学生都得死

translation.en: [Peter in Kinyarwanda] Francois is not here.
[Seba in Kinyarwanda] You know he is not here.
So you know where he is!
translation.zh: ‎这么说 你知道他在哪里！

translation.en: [Seba in English] Peter, earn your place among Hutus again.
translation.zh: ‎皮特 你要夺回在胡图族里的地位

translation.en: [in Kinyarwanda] Either tell us where Francois is
translation.zh: ‎要么告诉我们弗朗索瓦在哪里

translation.en: or take my machete and chop these cockroaches for me.
translation.zh:
‎要么就拿起我的大砍刀
‎帮我把这些蟑螂砍死

translation.en: If you do not, I will kill them,
translation.zh:
‎如果你不这么做
‎那我就会亲手杀了他们

translation.en: -[Seba in English] Do it, or it is you. -[Peter sobbing]
translation.zh: ‎动手吧 否则死的就是你

translation.en: [Peter in Kinyarwanda] No more! No more!

translation.zh: ‎我没办法把所有人都杀了 求求你！

translation.en: [Seba in English] Tell us where Francois and the rest of your cockroaches are hiding,
translation.zh:
‎告诉我们弗朗索瓦
‎和其他蟑螂都藏在哪儿

translation.en: and I will let those two babies live.
translation.zh: ‎我就会让那两个婴儿活下去

translation.en: -[girl crying] -[Seba] It's okay, little girl. Don't cry.
translation.zh: ‎没事的 小姑娘 别哭了

translation.en: They are hiding in a small school.
It is new. A few miles outside Kigali.
translation.zh:
‎是一所新学校
‎在基加利城外几公里处

translation.en: [Mutesi] We have to get out of here.

translation.zh: ‎一定能打开的 再推一把

translation.en: You've seen how they can fit into the smallest hole.
translation.zh:
‎你也见识过了
‎他们连再小的洞也能挤进去

translation.en: [in English] You and your husband are traitors to your people.
translation.zh: ‎你和你丈夫背叛了你们的族人

translation.en: [in Kinyarwanda] Annick, if you surrender, perhaps we will spare your life.
translation.zh:
‎安妮可 如果你投降
‎也许我们会饶你一命

translation.en: I know you are up there.
[man 1] Seba, I think I heard one of them.
translation.zh: ‎塞巴 我好像听到了一个人的声音

translation.en: Tell her how we tortured her husband.
translation.zh: ‎告诉她我们是如何折磨她丈夫的

translation.en: [Seba] We found him hiding in that school.
translation.zh: ‎我们逮到他在那所学校里躲着

translation.en: He shitted himself like a frightened animal.
translation.zh:
‎他像受惊的动物一样
‎把屎拉在了裤裆上

translation.en: [in Kinyarwanda] We cut off his feet first so he could not run.
translation.zh:
‎我们先切掉了他的脚
‎这样他就跑不掉了

translation.en: Still, he would not tell us a thing
translation.zh: ‎但他还是什么都不跟我们说

translation.en: [Seba in English] He told us everything we needed to know.
translation.zh: ‎他把我们需要知道的一切都招了

translation.en: By then, he was in a lot of pain, so we tried to be merciful.
translation.zh:
‎那时他痛不欲生
‎所以我们尽量高抬贵手

translation.en: Offered him a bullet for only 7,000 francs.
translation.zh:
‎我们提出 他只用付七千块法郎
‎我们就可以送他一枚子弹

translation.en: So I slit his throat open.
[Hutu soldier] Seba, the commander is looking for you.
[Seba in Kinyarwanda] Give me more time!
[Seba in Kinyarwanda] All right! Let's go.
But we will come back at sunup to find these cockroaches.
translation.zh:
‎但我们会在太阳升起时回来
‎揪出这些蟑螂

translation.en: The storm is loud enough to cover us.
translation.zh: ‎暴风雨的咆哮声足以掩护我们

translation.en: If we can get out of here,
we can get to the Mille Collines.
translation.zh: ‎就能成功抵达米勒科林斯酒店

translation.en: So many bodies in the street.
If you stay, we will all stay.
translation.zh: ‎如果你要留下 我们就都留下

translation.en: And I would rather die than let any man hurt me again.
translation.zh:
‎我宁愿死
‎也不会让任何男人再伤害我了

translation.en: If he is to be a strong boy, he must have a strong mother.
translation.zh:
‎如果要他成为一个坚强的男孩
‎他的母亲也必须坚强

translation.en: we are the sisters you never wanted.
That is why we must leave.
[man] He said they are inside, in the kitchen. Quickly.
translation.zh: ‎他说她们在里面 在厨房里 快点

translation.en: We are safe. These men are RPF.
translation.zh:
‎我们安全了
‎这些人是卢旺达爱国阵线的

translation.en: They found the school, yes, yes.
I left only for a few hours to bury Nafia. But when I returned…
translation.zh:
‎我离开了几个小时
‎去把纳菲亚埋了起来 但我回来时

translation.en: We survived 81 days in that room.
But we found the most important thing we never knew to look for,
translation.zh:
‎但我们找到了最重要的东西
‎之前却从未想过去寻找的东西
